content: calming baby crochet hat by stacey winklepleck 55734 finished measurements notions preemie newborn 3-6mths 12 14 16 yarn needle circumference gauge yarn 18 sts and 16 row = 4 in half double knit picks comfy sport 75% pima cotton crochet 25% acrylic 136 yards/50g lilac mist 24432 1 ball hooks us 7 4 5mm crochet hook or size to obtain gauge © copyright knit picks ® all rights reserved for private non-commercial use only please see our website for terms of use www knitpicks com 1 800 574-1323 for pattern support contact customerservice@knitpicks com calming baby crochet hat round 5 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet *2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end of round join with slip_stitch notes to first half_double_crochet 48 sts hats are always adorable on newborns and babies and this soft round 6 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 5 half_double_crochet *2 half_double_crochet in next and simple hat will fit the bill starting from the top and using half half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 5 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end of round join with slip_stitch double_crochet you ll be finished in no time and be ready to start to first half_double_crochet 56 sts another preemie size - skip to round 9 magic_ring round 7 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 6 half_double_crochet *2 half_double_crochet in next please see our tutorial for instructions half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 6 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end of round join with slip_stitch http //tutorials knitpicks com/wptutorials/learn-to-crochet-the- to first half_double_crochet 64 sts magic-circle/ newborn sizes - skip to round 9 front post double_crochet fpdc yo insert hook into gap between two stitches from front to back round 8 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in next 7 half_double_crochet *2 half_double_crochet in next then around the post and out to the front side of the work wrap half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 7 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end of round join with slip_stitch yarn around hook and draw a loop onto hook pulling the hook to first half_double_crochet 72 sts back out the way you went in 3 loops on hook now make the round 9 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in all half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch double_crochet in the normal manner yo draw through 2 loops yo draw to first half_double_crochet through remaining 2 loops on hook repeat last round 8 12 16 more times directions brim set up create a large magic_ring work 8 half_double_crochet in circle join to next round chain 1 fpdc in same st double_crochet in next half_double_crochet *fpdc in next first half_double_crochet with slip_stitch 8 st tighten circle half_double_crochet double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat from * to end of round join with slip_stitch to round 1 chain 1 does not count as first st here and throughout 2 first fpdc 56 64 72 sts half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join
